titleStmt.title: A letter from the commanders and officers of the fleet of this Common-wealth unto General Monck in Scotland. Dated the 4th. of November 1659.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Sarah Griffin for Thomas Hewer, and are to be sold at her house in Eliots Court in the little Old Baily,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: her house in Eliots Court in the little Old Baily
